item.title: One Question :O
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

This is what you want, I think:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("::cash")&& playerRights >=2){ addItem(0995,100); sendMessage("Lemme tell Other Players ;)"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "A Moderator Has Just Used a 100GP Code."; }

By the way, you really shouldn’t need a command generator. I’m a retarded monkey for christ’s sake, and I don’t need one… often.

Read full topic

item.title: One Question :O

item.description:

addItem(0995,100);
sendMessage(“Lemme tell Other Players ;)”);
sendMessage(“You have left to spend”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “A Moderator Has Just Used a 100GP Code.”;
}
